entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
